entity.name: White House on lockdown for the second time in 5 days
entity.description: The Secret Service responded to an incident involving a suspicious package located on Pennsylvania Ave.

text: @funder In a normal Administration this would mean the White House would go on complete lockdown for 14 days while a nation held it's collective breath but this isn't a normal Administration so we can expect them to completely ignore the fact that the @WhiteHouse is a #COVID19 hot spot.
